meanings.definition: The state of being too mature or advanced for a particular situation or context.
meanings.sent1: Her overmaturity in handling complex tasks made her stand out among her peers.
meanings.sent2: The overmaturity of the child's vocabulary surprised the teachers.
meanings.sent3: The overmaturity of the young comedian's jokes left the audience puzzled.
meanings.sent4: His overmaturity in the game of chess was akin to a grandmaster's strategic thinking.
meanings.sent5: The overmaturity of the plant caused it to bloom earlier than expected.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being excessively mature or developed.
meanings.sent1: The overmaturity of the fruit made it too soft to eat.
meanings.sent2: Her overmaturity in fashion sense made her the trendsetter in the group.
meanings.sent3: The overmaturity of the cheese gave it a unique and intense flavor.
meanings.sent4: The overmaturity of the technology rendered the old devices obsolete.
meanings.sent5: The overmaturity of the wine enhanced its rich and complex taste.
